text: The Mahathir Science Award Foundation is a Malaysian group. It gives an award for great work in science and technology that helps with tropical problems. The Foundation started on 17 August 2004 to honor former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad. ==Award-winners== * Alimuddin Zumla * Hugh Possingham * Kerrie Wilson * Erik Meijaard * Rita R. Colwell * Alan Cowman * Yuan Longping ==References== Category:Organizations based in Malaysia Category:Mahathir Mohamad
title: Mahathir Science Award
